description: This file is a C header file that declares exported API functions for a TLS Alert Handler component within the BroadWay Service Delivery System. It contains function prototypes for creating and initializing the TLS alert handler object, which is part of a larger TLS implementation.

methods.name: TlsCreateAlertHandler
methods.description: Creates an instance of the TLS Alert Handler object with specified container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: TlsAhoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new instance of the TLS Alert Handler.

methods.name: TlsAhoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the TLS Alert Handler object.
